original_text: So he called ten of his servants and gave them ten minas. ‘Put this money to work,’ he said, ‘until I come back.’
korean_text: 그 종 열을 불러 은화 열 므나를 주며 이르되 내가 돌아올 때까지 장사하라 하니라

sentences.original_text: So he called ten of his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자신의 종 열 명을 불렀고

sentences.original_text: ‘Put this money to work,’ he said
